flavor_text: It leads a group of Pawniard. It battles to become the boss but will be driven from the group if it loses.
Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of Pawniard. Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.
This pitiless Pokemon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then moves in to finish the prey off.
